panels.description: Monitor the number of background errors in RocksDB.
panels.title: RocksDB Background Errors

panels.description: Monitor the current actual delayed write rate. 0 means no delay.
panels.title: RocksDB Actual Delayed Write Rate

panels.description: Estimate the memory used for reading SST tables, excluding memory used in block cache (e.g.,filter and index blocks) in bytes.
panels.title: RocksDB Estimate Table Readers Memory

panels.description: Monitor number of live versions. Version is an internal data structure. See RocksDB file version_set.h for details. More live versions often mean more SST files are held from being deleted, by iterators or unfinished compactions.
panels.title: RocksDB Num Live Versions

panels.description: Track whether write has been stopped in RocksDB. Returns 1 if write has been stopped, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: RocksDB Is Write Stopped

panels.description: Estimate the number of keys in RocksDB.
panels.title: RocksDB Estimate Num Keys

panels.description: Monitor the number of immutable memtables in RocksDB.
panels.title: RocksDB Num Immutable Memtable

panels.description: Monitor the number of currently running compactions and flushes.
panels.title: RocksDB Running Compactions & Flushes

panels.description: Track pending compactions and flushes in RocksDB. Returns 1 if a compaction/flush is pending, 0 otherwise.
panels.title: RocksDB Pending Compactions & Flushes

panels.description: Estimated total number of bytes compaction needs to rewrite to get all levels down to under target size. Not valid for other compactions than level-based.
panels.title: RocksDB Estimate Pending Compaction Bytes

panels.description: Monitor the memory size for the entries being pinned in block cache and residing in block cache.
panels.title: RocksDB BlockCache Usage

panels.description: Monitor the approximate size of the memtables in bytes.
panels.title: RocksDB Memtables Size

panels.description: Monitor the total size (bytes) of all SST files and live data.
panels.title: RocksDB Total Size

panels.description: Monitor the total number of entries in the memtables.
panels.title: RocksDB Num Entries in Memtables

panels.description: Monitor the total number of delete entries in the memtables.
panels.title: RocksDB Num Deletes in Memtables
